bibl.title: Petitioner v. Defendant. Type of Document.
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image.

div1.p: Territory of Washington County of Walla Walla }SS
In the the matter of the opposition of F Fetter for Custody of Suzannah Fetter

Lena Fetter for answer to the said Petition denies that on the 23rd day of May 1869 the said child was taken from the custody of said F Fetter by the affiant or any other person or persons and says that in consequence of harsh an cruel treatment of said Fetter to the affiant she was compelled to leave her house and that said child was assigned to her custody of said F Fetter denies that at the solicitation of one E Crowne or any other person she left said F Fetter and says that she was compelled by the said F Fetter to leave his house and that she went

to Wallula on her way to friends at Oregon city of her own free will and without solicitation of any person and alleges that she did so for the purposes of earning a living for herself and child affiant avers that she is fully competent to take the care and custody of said child and said F Fetter from his habits and violent temper was an unfit person to have care and custody and training of said child wherefor affiant praise that the custody of said child be awarded to her
Louis R Dugan atty for Lena Fetter
In the matter of the application of F Fetter for a writ of Habeas Corups

Whereas it has been made satisfacory to appear to me by affiant of F Fetter that Eugene Crowne and Mrs. Lenna Fetter wife of F Fetter affiant-have in said custody Susannah Fetter aged five years and six months the daugher of the affiant and are about to remove said child to the state of Oregon and beyond the jursidiction of this court Now therfore it is here now ordered

That a warrant issue by the clerk of the court ordered to the sheriff of Walla Walla County commanding him to take in his custody the said minor child susannah fetter and to produce said child before me at the Court House in the city of Walla Walla and the said sheriff
JE Wyche Judge
May 27th 1869
In the matter of the application of F Fetter for Writ of Habeas Corpus
Filed May 27th 1869 B.B. Wayeho Clerk
Order of Court
Lenna Fetter must produce the body of the said child Susannah Fetter before your honor & that the said be arrested unless they give security for the production of said minor child
F. Fetter
Territory of Washington Walla Walla } }SS
Frank Fetter being first duly sworn says that he is the petitioner that he knowns not of the foregoing petition and that the same is true as is true as he verily believes F. Fetter
subscribed and sworn to before me this 27th May 1869
L.A. Mueller Notary Public
Filed May 27th 1869
B.B. Wayeho
Clerk
Territory of Washington Walla Walla County }SS In the matter of the application of F. Fetter for a writ of Habeas Corpus
To the Hon JE Wyche judge of district Court of the 1st Judical district

The petition of F. Fetter must respectfully respondance That he is the father of and legal gaurdian of his minor daughter named Susannah Fetter aged five years and six months and entitiled to the custody and care thereof

That on the 27th day of May 1869 the said minor child now taken from the care and custody of your petitioner by Mr Eugene Crowne and Mrs. Linna Fetter the wife of your petitioner who has left and abandoned your petitioner at the solicitation of the said E Crowne and that the said child is now restrained of her liberty by said practices and that the said practices are now to answer the said minor child from the territory – your petitioner says that he does not know where said child is kept but believes that said practices have left for Wallula with the intent to go to Oregon Wherefor your petitioner prays that the said a Writ of Habeas Corpus may issue commanding the said E Crowne and
